home_description: Bitcoin is better money that is building a better world. Bitcoin has protected human rights, saved people from high inflation, supported local farmers, reduced emissions from oil drilling, and so much more.
home_intro: Bitcoin is better money that is building a better world. Tap on a category below to learn how Bitcoin makes it better, or just start scrolling to explore.
